div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1688 Tell Nebesheh (anc. Am), 50 km. (1087) E of El Mans√ªra, 1886 Burial: c. 242 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 25 AR. From excavations Ptolemy I: 2 tetradr. (Alexandreia as Svo- ronos 252, 256) Ptolemy II: 20 tetradr. (Alexandreia 5 as Sv. 355, 362, 371, 389, 411; tetradr. Tyre 2 as Sv. 637, 647; tetradr. Sidon 8 as Sv. 713, 719; tetradr. Ace 5 as Sv. 529, 786) Ptolemy III: 1 tetradr. (Sidon as Sv. 1029) Unc.: 2 tetradr. Disposition: unknown Petrie, Tanis, pp. 25-6
